Nov. 6, 1949 D West Riding Contest (2nd Section)
West Riding Contest (2nd Section) 20 Test Piece Contest West Riding Contest west-riding-contest-2nd-section
Petite Suite de Ballet
Victoria Hall, Saltaire, Shipley, Yorkshire March contest - 1st Harworth Colliery 76pts, 2nd Moderna Works 74pts, 3rd Yorkshire Transport 71pts. 2nd annual contest. 11 bands competed.
Feb. 14, 2014, 1:17 p.m. March 2, 2019, 1:41 p.m.
1 Moderna Blanket Works Tom Casson
2 Haworth Band A. C. Rogerson
3 Harworth Brass George Thorpe
4 Askern Colliery Band Jack Boddice
Unknown Result Black Dyke Mills Junior Unknown
Unknown Result Skelmanthorpe Band Unknown
Unknown Result Yorkshire Traction Unknown
